version.details: Version is used so that the installer can know what version it currently is, and if LazyBlaze is already installed on a machine, what version is installed.
The situation we're trying to avoid is someone with an older version of the config running a newer version of LazyBlaze and encountering errors because the format of the config has changed.
Major version should be incremented when making a breaking change (a rename, a new section, etc). When major version is updated, minor version should be reset to 001.
Minor version should be incremented when making a non-breaking change
If LazyBlaze is creating a new user config file it will copy the version info from this file into the new user config file

installdirectory.details: If useuserdirectory in options is True, it will find the current users user directory (for example C:\Users\dan\) and add userdirectory from below.
If useuserdirectory in options is False, it will use fulldirectory from below.
